config.directions: Move the slider to explore the timeline.

entries.content:
Jugurthine Wars. c. 164 BCE–102 BCE. Known for:

  • Numidians vs Romans
  • Jugurtha
entries.caption: Map of Africa Propria and Numidia
entries.alt: Map of Africa Propria and Numidia

entries.content:
Social Wars: c. 91 BCE–87 BCE. Known for:

  • Italian allies vs. Romans
entries.caption: Social Wars

entries.content:
Mithridatic Wars: c. 88 BCE–63 BCE. Known for:

  • city of Pontus vs. Rome
  • the ruler, Mithridates VI
  • Mithridatic poison
entries.caption: Gates of Mithradates

entries.content:
Spartacus: c. 73 BCE–72 BCE. Known for:

  • slave rebellion
  • the Thracian slave, Spartacus
entries.alt: Image of Spartacus falling in battle against the Romans
